src_original: sambuddhaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sarvajña karuṇāspadaṃ /  samantabhadraśāstāraṃ śākyasiṃhaṃ namāmyahaṃ // SvayambhuP_10.57 //
tgt_original: saṃbuddhaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sarvajñaṃ karuṇātmakam |  samantabhadraṃ śāstāraṃ śākyasiṃhaṃ namāmyaham || 1 ||

src_original: śrīghanaṃ śrīmatiṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śīlarāśiṃ śivakaraṃ /  śrīmantaṃ śrīkaraṃ śāntaṃ śāntimūrti namāmyaham // SvayambhuP_10.58 //
tgt_original: śrīghanaṃ śrīmatiṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śītarāśiṃ śivaṃkaram |  śrīmantaṃ śrīkaraṃ śāntaṃ śāntamūrtiṃ namāmyaham || 2 ||

src_original: nairātmavādinaṃ siṃhaṃ niravadyaṃ nirāśravaṃ /  nītijñaṃ nirmalātmānaṃ niṣkalaṃkaṃ namāmyaham // SvayambhuP_10.59 //  nirdvandvaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ nirvikalpaṃ tathāgataṃ /
tgt_original: nairātmyavādinaminduṃ niravadyaṃ nirāśrayam |  śrutijñaṃ nirmalātmānaṃ nisthūlakaṃ namāmyaham || 3 ||

src_original: viśveśvaraṃ viśeṣo 'haṃ viśvarūpaṃ vināyakaṃ /  vidhāvareṇa saṃpannaṃ viśveśamvimalaprabhaṃ /
tgt_original: viśveśvaraṃ vimuktijñaṃ viśvarupaṃ vināyakam |  viśvabrahma susampannaṃ vītarāgaṃ namāmyaham || 5 ||
vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaṃ viśveśaṃ vimalaprabham |  vinimajñaṃ saviṣṭambhaṃ vītamohaṃ namāmyaham || 6 ||

src_original: dudantidamakaṃ śāntaṃ śuddhaṃ pañcajinālayaṃ /  sugatiṃ suśrutaṃ saumyaṃ śubhrakīrtti namāmyahaṃ // SvayambhuP_10.63 //
tgt_original: durdāntadamakaṃ śāntaṃ śuddhaṃ śauddhodaniṃ munim |  sugataṃ sugatiṃ saumyaṃ śubhrakīrtiṃ namāmyaham || 7 ||

src_original: yogīśvaraṃ daśabalaṃ lokajñaṃ lokapūjitaṃ /  lokācārya lokamūrtiṃ lokānāthaṃ namāmyahaṃ // SvayambhuP_10.64 //
